extendedInfo.description: * Mint omelette with green peas* Salad with mango* Salad with beef tongue and apples* Shrimp salad and pears* Salad "Callas"* Lenten soup with mushrooms and buckwheat* Spicy chicken soup* Rolled pork with potatoes* Beef casserole with potatoes and corn* Meatless pilaf in a pumpkin* Stuffed vegetables* Pike-perch with mussels, asparagus and green sauce* Chicken with cheese kets* Pie with cheese curd tarts* Cherry and chocolate cake* Cottage cheese pie* Coconut flan* Oatmeal* Kissel of dried apricots* Appetizer of quail eggs with trout* Sandwich cakes with ham* Salad with couscous and beta* Warm salad of carrots, corn and peppers* Chicken salad, kiwi and grapefruit* Pickle with fish balls* Beets, baked with cheese* Eggs with asparagus and peas* Pea soup with bacon and tomatoes* Roast chicken "celebratory cake"* Carp with nuts and pomegranate seeds* Lamb stew with vegetables and dried apricots* Zrazy beef* Easter buns* Orange pudding* Tricolor bread* Sand cake with jam* Chocolate eggs with raspberry* Cocktail "Bellini"
